title: 🎮 Welcome to Uduality Minecraft Server
description: Join our vibrant community and start your adventure! We're a friendly server with voice chat support and regular events.

fields.name: ⚙️ Requirements
fields.value:
• Minecraft Java Edition 1.21.4
• Fabric Loader (For Non-cracked clients)
• Simple Voice Chat mod
• Discord account (for voice chat)

fields.name: 🚀 Official Installation
fields.value:
1. Install Fabric Loader from [fabricmc.net](https://fabricmc.net/use/)
2. Download Simple Voice Chat from [CurseForge](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/simple-voice-chat)
3. Place mod in your `.minecraft/mods` folder
4. Launch Minecraft with Fabric profile

fields.name: 🔓 Legacy Launcher Guide
fields.value:
1. Download [Legacy Launcher](https://llaun.ch/)
2. Create new profile with Fabric 1.21.4
3. Add Simple Voice Chat to profile's mods folder
4. Launch and connect to `play.uduality.site`

fields.name: ❓ Need Help?
fields.value:
• DM @justrecht for support
• Join our Discord for community help
• Check our FAQ in #minecraft-help

footer.text: Uduality Minecraft Server • Join us today!
